## Variables independientes

**Estudiantes**

```{r echo=F, warning=F, error=F}
pacman::p_load(dplyr, summarytools)
load("IPO/input/data/proc/data_est.RData")
load("IPO/input/data/proc/data_apod.RData")

data_est2 <- data_est %>% dplyr::select(libros,
                                 ap_dis1,
                                 ap_dis2,
                                 ap_dis3,
                                 ap_dis4,
                                 ap_dis5,
                                 ap_dis6,
                                 c_civic1,
                                 c_civic2,
                                 c_civic3,
                                 c_civic4,
                                 c_civic5,
                                 c_civic6,
                                 c_civic7)

print(dfSummary(data_est2,
                varnumbers = F, 
                graph.col = F, 
                style = "grid",
                headings = F),
      method = "render")
```
